"Commerce Secretary Says Trump-Xi Talks Will Address Trade Imbalances" by REUTERS via NYT Asia Pacific # Meetings between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing this week will focus on addressing trade imbalances between the two countries, U.S. Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross said on Wednesday.

"Workhorse to Test Electric Vans for New Customer in California, Ohio" by REUTERS via NYT # Electric delivery van maker Workhorse Group Inc said on Tuesday it will test its new lightweight N-Gen electric van in cities in Ohio and California as the race to develop mass-market electric delivery vehicles heats up.

"CVS-Aetna Deal Gets Wall Street Thumbs Up Amid Amazon Entry Fears" by REUTERS via NYT # U.S. pharmacy operator CVS Health Corp's move to buy health insurer Aetna Inc will broaden their reach in the industry and could spark another round of dealmaking in a sector dreading Amazon's arrival, analysts said.

"Amazon Gains Wholesale Pharmacy Licenses in Many U.S. States: Report" by REUTERS via NYT # Amazon.com Inc has gained approval from a number of state pharmaceutical boards to become a wholesale distributor, St. Louis Post-Dispatch reported on Thursday, citing public records.

It is with great privilege that I write to you in recommendation of Adnan. Until recently, I have been working very closely with him. Michael Lyons
Demand Generation Strategy at ANNUITAS | Founder at GlobalPetals.com
April 14, 2016, Adnan managed Michael directly

It was a pleasure working with Michael. While we weren’t looking to make a hire at that point in time, after meeting with Michael it was clear that getting him onboard was a fantastic opportunity.  During his time with us, Michael was a valuable addition to the team and helped us launch and optimize our client onboarding process. There are a few qualities I’d specifically mention: He’s got a very strong work ethic and always follows through, without exception.He’s passionate about learning new things and actively seeks to learn from and about others. He’s undoubtedly one of the best I’ve seen at being able to bring order, measurement and process to chaotic and dynamic situations. Definitely an A player. I expect to see big things from him in the future!
